name: Lawyerspad
tag_list: law-practice, law-practice-management, timesheet-management, contacts-management, daily-email-and-sms-alerts, litigation-management, efficient-practice-management, group-calendaring, sophisticated-security-mechanism
overview:
LawyersPad is an online software solution specifically designed to help solo practitioners and small law firms simplify management, leaving you more time and energy for client matters. It acts as a digital support team by bringing together everything you need to manage a case or matter. And by allowing you to easily access the information you need online from your smartphone, laptop or PC regardless of platform or device,

LawyersPad helps you efficiently manage cases, meet deadlines, and stay organized. Manage your practice your way and as per your schedule. Stay on top of upcoming meetings, deadlines and tasks with daily email notification. Using our fully integrated practice management software, you will be able to work more efficiently, lower risk and improve client service.

LawyersPad offers a highly intuitive and user friendly interface that makes it easy to organize everything you need for managing each case and all its relevant information with 99.9% availability. Find what you need faster with the LawyersPad Dashboard. It’s everything you need to manage your practice made accessible from one place. Stay aware of all your commitments with a mini-calendar that ensures you don’t miss critical events.

Specialties Law Practice, Timesheet Management, Contacts Management, Daily email and SMS alerts, Litigation Management, Efficient Practice Management, Group Calendaring, Sophisticated Security Mechanism
